source:
# The scource files are uncommented for the Productionized run (Remove the `#` when troubleshooting these scripts)

#dboLocation = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboLocation.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboLocation.createOrReplaceTempView("dboLocation")

# Load EXCEL with LMS_DEPOT_DESCRIPTION

# Variables
var_File_Path = "abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Excel_Files/FinanceReportingMapping.xlsx"
var_File_Page = "LMS_DEPOT_DESCRIPTION"

# Processing
excel_file = pd.ExcelFile(var_File_Path)
excel_file_page = pd.read_excel(excel_file, var_File_Page)
excel_file_Dataframe = spark.createDataFrame(excel_file_page)

excel_file_Dataframe.createOrReplaceTempView("LMS_DEPOT_DESCRIPTION")

LMS_DEPOT_DESCRIPTION = spark.sql("""SELECT `LMS Depot Description`, `DEPOTCODE`, `PARENTDEPOTCODE` FROM LMS_DEPOT_DESCRIPTION""")

LMS_DEPOT_DESCRIPTION.createOrReplaceTempView("LMS_DEPOT_DESCRIPTION")

LFLOCATION = spark.sql("""

SELECT `ID` AS `LF_ID`,
       `Description` AS `LF_Description`,
       `Code` AS `LF_Code`,
       `Collect` AS `LF_Collect`,
       `PCode` AS `LF_PCode`,
       `CustID` AS `LF_CustID`,
       `Retail` AS `LF_Retail`,
       `Scale` AS `LF_Scale`,
       `CustCode` AS `LF_CustCode`,
       `CaptureOnly` AS `LF_CaptureOnly`,
       `ZoneID` AS `LF_ZoneID`,
       `ScanType` AS `LF_ScanType`,
       `BillCustID` AS `LF_BillCustID`,
       `Latitude` AS `LF_Latitude`,
       `Longitude` AS `LF_Longitude`,
       `HoldLocID` AS `LF_HoldLocID`,
       `BranchManagerUserID` AS `LF_BranchManagerUserID`,
       `FWCostCentre` AS `LF_FWCostCentre`,
       `FWUserID` AS `LF_FWUserID`,
       `FWMultiBusinessID` AS `LF_FWMultiBusinessID`,
       `GLCode` AS `LF_GLCode`,
       `HoldLocParentLocID` AS `LF_HoldLocParentLocID`
FROM dboLocation

""")
#LFLOCATION.show()
LFLOCATION.createOrReplaceTempView("LFLOCATION")

LFLOCATION = spark.sql("""

SELECT lfl.*,
       ldd.DEPOTCODE AS LF_SAPDepotCode,
       ldd.PARENTDEPOTCODE AS LF_ParentDepotCode
FROM LFLOCATION lfl
LEFT JOIN LMS_DEPOT_DESCRIPTION ldd
      ON lfl.LF_Description = ldd.`LMS Depot Description`

""")
#LFLOCATION.show()
LFLOCATION.createOrReplaceTempView("LFLOCATION")

DIM_Location = spark.sql("""

SELECT LF_Description AS L_LMSDepotDescription,
       LF_ID AS L_LocationID,
       LF_SAPDepotCode AS D_SAPDepotCode,
       LF_ParentDepotCode AS D_ParentDepotCode
FROM LFLOCATION

""")
#DIM_Location.show()
DIM_Location.createOrReplaceTempView("DIM_Location")
